definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: So lets suppose you have a scientific theory in terms of atoms.
sentences.chinese: 假設你在原子論方面擁有一套科學理論。

sentences.english: Democritus’ atomic theory has other modern connotations.
sentences.chinese: 德謨克利特的原子論還具有另一個現代的隱含意義。
